Core.name: Backstab
Core.text: Deal $2 damage to an undamaged minion.
Core.flavor: It's funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Rogue.

Core.name: Innervate
Core.text: Gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
Core.flavor: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Druid.

Core.name: Pounce
Core.text: Give your hero +2_Attack this turn.
Core.flavor: Comes with an overwhelming urge to jump into the nearest open box.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Druid.

Core.name: Preparation
Core.text: The next spell you cast this turn costs (2) less.
Core.flavor: "Be Prepared" - Rogue Motto
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 250 games as Rogue.

Core.name: Shadowstep
Core.text: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It_costs (2) less.
Core.flavor: Rogue dance troops will sometimes Shadowstep away at the end of a performance.  Crowds love it.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Rogue.

Core.name: Abusive Sergeant
Core.text: Battlecry: Give a minion +2_Attack this turn.
Core.flavor: ADD ME TO YOUR DECK, MAGGOT!
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 500 total wins.

Core.name: Arcane Shot
Core.text: Deal $2 damage.
Core.flavor: Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves.  The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Hunter.

Core.name: Babbling Book
Core.text: Battlecry: Add a random Mage spell to your hand.
Core.flavor: His idol is the Green Hills of Stranglethorn, and he won't shut up about it.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Mage.

Core.name: Battlefiend
Core.text: After your hero attacks, gain +1 Attack.
Core.flavor: Say what you like about my hatchet-headed hooligan, he’s my battle-friend.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Demon Hunter.

Core.name: Beaming Sidekick
Core.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +2 Health.
Core.flavor: Sure, I'll carry the water! And the food! And the tents! And the cursed monkey paw!
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 500 total wins.

Core.name: Body Bagger
Core.text: Battlecry: Gain a Corpse.
Core.flavor: Gotta get that bag.
Core.howToGet: Unlocked after completing the Death Knight Prologue.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Death Knight.

Core.name: Buccaneer
Core.text: Whenever you equip a weapon, give it +1 Attack.
Core.flavor: The best part of buccaneering is the pants.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Rogue.

Core.name: Candleshot
Core.text: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
Core.flavor: Once called Cahn’delar, Shortbow of the Ancient Whisker.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Hunter.

Core.name: Crimson Sigil Runner
Core.text: Outcast: Draw a card.
Core.flavor: He's not the fastest of the bunch, but he'll take a stab at it anyway.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Demon Hunter.

Core.name: Deadly Poison
Core.text: Give your weapon +2_Attack.
Core.flavor: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Rogue.

Core.name: Elven Archer
Core.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
Core.flavor: Don't bother asking her out on a date.  She'll shoot you down.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 500 total wins.

Core.name: Emerald Skytalon
Core.text: Rush
Core.flavor: Sworn protectors of Ysera at the Emerald Dragonshrine, these majestic owls have been touched by the powers of the Emerald Dream, taking on an almost crystalline appearance.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 500 total wins.

Core.name: Execute
Core.text: Destroy a damaged enemy minion.
Core.flavor: It's okay, he deserved it.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Warrior.

Core.name: Feast of Souls
Core.text: Draw a card for each friendly minion that died this turn.
Core.flavor: Nothing fills you up like soul food!
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Demon Hunter.

Core.name: Flame Imp
Core.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.
Core.flavor: Imps like being on fire.  They just do.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Warlock.

Core.name: Flash Heal
Core.text: Restore #5 Health.
Core.flavor: Flash!  Ahhhhhhh~
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Priest.

Core.name: Heart Strike
Core.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. If that kills it, gain a Corpse.
Core.flavor: Love hurts.
Core.howToGet: Unlocked after completing the Death Knight Prologue.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Death Knight.

Core.name: Holy Smite
Core.text:
Deal $3 damage
to a minion.
Core.flavor: It doesn't matter how pious you are.  Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Priest.

Core.name: Lightning Bolt
Core.text: Deal $3 damage. Overload: (1)
Core.flavor: Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt!
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Shaman.

Core.name: Living Roots
Core.text: Choose One - Deal $2 damage; or Summon two 1/1 Saplings.
Core.flavor: 2 out of 2 saplings recommend that you summon the saplings.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Druid.

Core.name: Mistress of Mixtures
Core.text: Deathrattle: Restore #4 Health to each hero.
Core.flavor: Her favorite mixture is cola and lime.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 500 total wins.

Core.name: Mortal Coil
Core.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.
Core.flavor: If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Warlock.

Core.name: Murloc Tidecaller
Core.text: Whenever you summon a Murloc, gain +1 Attack.
Core.flavor: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 1000 total wins.

Core.name: Northshire Cleric
Core.text: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.
Core.flavor: They help the downtrodden and distressed.  Also they sell cookies.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Priest.

Core.name: Novice Zapper
Core.text: Spell Damage +1 Overload: (1)
Core.flavor: The novices would prefer that he did not.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Shaman.

Core.name: Noxious Cadaver
Core.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to an enemy and your hero.
Core.flavor: Shouldn't have eaten that gas station sushi.
Core.howToGet: Unlocked after completing the Death Knight Prologue.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Death Knight.

Core.name: Plagued Grain
Core.text: Gain 4 Corpses. Shuffle four Crates into your deck that summon a 2/2 Undead when drawn.
Core.flavor: Oh, don’t mind the smell. They're just aged!
Core.howToGet: Unlocked after completing the Death Knight Prologue.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Death Knight.

Core.name: Psychic Conjurer
Core.text: Battlecry: Copy a card in your opponent’s deck and add it to your hand.
Core.flavor: "I see... a WISP? Why do you have a wisp?!"
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Priest.

Core.name: Righteous Protector
Core.text: Taunt Divine Shield
Core.flavor: Original name was Tubular Protector, but this seems more bodacious.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Paladin.

Core.name: Runeforging
Core.text: Draw a weapon. Spend a Corpse to reduce its Cost by (1).
Core.flavor: I swear the runes are genuine!
Core.howToGet: Unlocked after completing the Death Knight Prologue.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Death Knight.

Core.name: Shield Slam
Core.text: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.
Core.flavor: "What is a better weapon? The sharp one your enemies expect, or the blunt one they ignore?" - The Art of Warrior, Chapter 9
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 250 games as Warrior.

Core.name: Shooting Star
Core.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion and the minions next to it.
Core.flavor: Literally starstruck.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Mage.

Core.name: Sir Finley Mrrgglton
Core.text: Battlecry: Discover a new basic Hero Power.
Core.flavor: In addition to fluent Common, he also speaks fourteen dialects of 'mrgl'.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 5000 total wins.

Core.name: Skeletal Sidekick
Core.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly Undead +2 Attack.
Core.flavor: He's got your back. And your arm.
Core.howToGet: Unlocked after completing the Death Knight Prologue.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Death Knight.

Core.name: Slam
Core.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it survives, draw a card.
Core.flavor: "Dun da dun, dun da dun": if you've heard an ogre sing this, it's too late.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Warrior.

Core.name: Snap Freeze
Core.text: Freeze a minion. If it's already Frozen, destroy it.
Core.flavor: Lick the ice block. I triple-double-dog-dare-you.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Mage.

Core.name: Springpaw
Core.text: [x]Rush Battlecry: Add a 1/1 Lynx with Rush to your hand.
Core.flavor: The terrible thing about lynxes is lynxes are terrible things. Their teeth are made out of biting, their paws are made out of springs!
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Hunter.

Core.name: Swashburglar
Core.text: Battlecry: Add a random card from another class to_your hand.
Core.flavor: Was almost named "Swashb-AAAARRHHH-gler"
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Rogue.

Core.name: Tracking
Core.text: Discover a card from your deck.
Core.flavor: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put into a deck!
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Hunter.

Core.name: Voidwalker
Core.text: Taunt
Core.flavor: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Warlock.

Core.name: Voodoo Doctor
Core.text: Battlecry: Restore #2_Health.
Core.flavor: Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 500 total wins.

Core.name: Whirlwind
Core.text: Deal $1 damage to ALL_minions.
Core.flavor: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Warrior.

Core.name: Worgen Infiltrator
Core.text: Stealth
Core.flavor: If you want to stop a worgen from infiltrating, just yell, "No! Bad boy!"

Core.name: Annoy-o-Tron
Core.text: Taunt Divine Shield
Core.flavor: The inventor of the Annoy-o-Tron was immediately expelled from Tinkerschool, Tinkertown, and was eventually exiled from the Eastern Kingdoms altogether.

Core.name: Arcanologist
Core.text: Battlecry: Draw a Secret.
Core.flavor: What did you draw? Shhhh… it’s a secret.

Core.name: Argent Protector
Core.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Divine Shield.
Core.flavor: "I'm not saying you can dodge fireballs.  I'm saying with this shield, you won't have to."
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Paladin.

Core.name: Bash
Core.text:
Deal $3 damage.
Gain 3 Armor.
Core.flavor: You might think bashing doesn't take a lot of practice.  It doesn't.

Core.name: Battlefield Necromancer
Core.text: [x]At the end of your turn, raise a Corpse as a 1/3 __Risen Footman with Taunt.__

Core.text: Spell Damage +1 Deathrattle: Draw a card.

Core.name: Bloodsail Raider
Core.text: Battlecry: Gain Attack equal to the Attack of your weapon.

Core.name: Bonedigger Geist

Core.name: Chaos Strike
Core.text: Give your hero +2_Attack this turn. Draw a card.
Core.flavor:
"What do we want?" "CHAOS!"
 "When do we want it?"
 "WHEN LEAST EXPECTED!"

Core.name: Crazed Alchemist
Core.text: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.
Core.flavor: "You'll love my new recipe!" he says... especially if you're not happy with your current number of limbs.

Core.name: Cruel Taskmaster
Core.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2_Attack.
Core.flavor: "I'm going to need you to come in on Sunday." - Cruel Taskmaster

Core.name: Darkshire Librarian
Core.text: Battlecry: Discard a random card. Deathrattle: Draw a card.
Core.flavor: Do NOT be late with your overdue fines.

Core.name: Defrost

Core.name: Dire Wolf Alpha
Core.text: Adjacent minions have +1_Attack.
Core.flavor: We are pretty excited about the upcoming release of Dire Wolf Beta, just repost this sign for a chance at a key.

Core.name: Doomsayer
Core.text: At the start of your turn, destroy ALL minions.

Core.name: Drain Soul
Core.text: Lifesteal Deal $3 damage to a minion.
Core.flavor: Cleans even the toughest clogs with just a flick of the wrist!

Core.name: Earthen Scales
Core.text: Give a friendly minion +1/+1, then gain Armor equal to its Attack.

Core.name: Equality
Core.text: Change the Health of ALL minions to 1.

Core.name: Explosive Sheep

Restore #4 Health.

Deal_$1_damage to_all_enemy_minions. Summon_a_random
1-Cost minion.

Your opponent's

Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Demon Hunter.

Core.name: Counterspell
Core.text: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
Core.flavor: What's the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn't?  The mage who isn't is getting Pyroblasted in the face.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Mage.

Core.name: Deadly Shot
Core.text: Destroy a random enemy minion.
Core.flavor: Our ballista operator is effective, but not picky.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Hunter.

Core.name: Explosive Runes
Core.text: Secret: After your opponent plays a minion, deal $6 damage to it and any excess to their hero.
Core.flavor: Sometimes it's safer NOT to read the warning signs.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Mage.

Core.name: Eye Beam
Core.text: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to a minion. Outcast: This costs (1).
Core.flavor: Sometimes looks CAN kill.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 250 games as Demon Hunter.

Core.name: Far Sight
Core.text: Draw a card. That card costs (3) less.
Core.flavor: Drek'thar can't see, but he can see. You know what I mean? It's ok if you don't.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 250 games as Shaman.

Core.name: Feral Rage
Core.text: Choose One - Give your hero +4 Attack this turn; or Gain 8 Armor.
Core.flavor: Let's be honest. One option is a lot ragier than the other.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Druid.

Core.name: Feral Spirit
Core.text: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. Overload: (1)
Core.flavor: Spirit wolves are like regular wolves with pom-poms.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Shaman.

Core.name: Fiendish Circle
Core.text: [x]Summon four 1/1 Imps.
Core.flavor: Like a knitting circle, but less evil.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Warlock.

Core.name: Frothing Berserker
Core.text: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
Core.flavor: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Warrior.

Core.name: Gan'arg Glaivesmith
Core.text: Outcast: Give your hero +3_Attack this turn.
Core.flavor: When isolation becomes motivation.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Demon Hunter.

Core.name: Gorillabot A-3
Core.text: Battlecry: If you control another Mech, Discover a Mech.
Core.flavor: A-1 and A-2 went nuts, when they should have gone bolts.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 500 total wins.

Core.name: Graveyard Shift
Core.text: [x]Summon two 1/1 Zombies with Reborn.
Core.flavor: "Why are we even open at night? This place is dead!"
Core.howToGet: Unlocked after completing the Death Knight Prologue.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Death Knight.

Core.name: Hellfire
Core.text: Deal $3 damage to ALL_characters.
Core.flavor: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Warlock.

Core.name: Hex
Core.text: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
Core.flavor: If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn't much of a change, is it?
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Shaman.

Core.name: Holy Nova
Core.text: Deal $2 damage to all enemy minions. Restore #2 Health to all friendly characters.
Core.flavor: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell.  Also, you're probably a jerk.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Priest.

Core.name: Humongous Razorleaf
Core.text: Can't attack.
Core.flavor: Loves goblins.  In a light cream sauce.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 1000 total wins.

Core.name: Ice Barrier
Core.text: Secret: When your hero is attacked, gain 8 Armor.
Core.flavor: This is Rank 1.  Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Mage.

Core.name: Imp Gang Boss
Core.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Imp.
Core.flavor: His imp gang likes to sneak into Stormwind to spraypaint "Ragnaros Rulez" on the Mage Tower.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Warlock.

Core.name: Lightning Storm
Core.text: Deal $3 damage to all_enemy minions. Overload: (1)
Core.flavor: An umbrella won't be effective, I'm afraid.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Shaman.

Core.name: Mounted Raptor
Core.text: Deathrattle: Summon a random 1-Cost minion.
Core.flavor: Clever girl!
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Druid.

Core.name: Murloc Warleader
Core.text: Your other Murlocs have +2 Attack.
Core.flavor: Do Murlocs ever get tired of making the same old sound?  Nope!  Mrglglrglglglglglglgl!
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 2500 total wins.

Core.name: Pyromaniac
Core.text: Whenever your Hero Power_kills a minion, draw a card.
Core.flavor: She prefers “Flammably Inclined.”
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Mage.

Core.name: Raid Leader
Core.text: Your other minions have +1 Attack.
Core.flavor: "That's a 50 DKP minus!"
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 500 total wins.

Core.name: Rimefang Sword
Core.text:
[x]After your hero attacks,
reduce the Cost of a spell
in your hand by (1).
Core.flavor: Those definitely don't rhyme.
Core.howToGet: Unlocked after completing the Death Knight Prologue.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Death Knight.

Core.name: Shadowed Spirit
Core.text: [x]Deathrattle: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
Core.flavor: They can't all be grim grinning ghosts.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Priest.

Core.name: SI:7 Agent
Core.text: Combo: Deal 2 damage.
Core.flavor: The agents of SI:7 are responsible for Stormwind's covert activities.  Their duties include espionage, assassination, and throwing surprise birthday parties for the royal family.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Rogue.

Core.name: Soul of the Forest
Core.text: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Treant."
Core.flavor: "Reforestation" is suddenly a terrifying word.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Druid.

Core.name: Southsea Captain
Core.text: Your other Pirates have +1/+1.
Core.flavor: When he saves enough plunder, he's going to commission an enormous captain's hat.  He has hat envy.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 2500 total wins.

Core.name: Tar Creeper
Core.text: Taunt Has +2 Attack during your opponent's turn.
Core.flavor: If you won't come to the tar pits, we'll bring them to you!
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 500 total wins.

Core.name: Vulpera Scoundrel
Core.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell or pick a mystery choice.
Core.flavor: A spell is a spell, but the mystery choice could be anything! (It's also a spell.)
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 2500 total wins.

Core.name: Warhorse Trainer
Core.text: Your Silver Hand Recruits have +2 Attack and Taunt.
Core.flavor: He doesn't even get Sundays off.  Every day he's hostling.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Paladin.

Core.name: Wild Growth
Core.text: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
Core.flavor: Grow your own mana crystals with this Mana Crystal Growth Kit, only 39.99!
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Druid.

Core.name: Wrathscale Naga
Core.text: After a friendly minion dies, deal 3 damage to a_random enemy.
Core.flavor:
If throwing glaives is what you crave; 
summon tokens and make 'em broken.

Core.name: Ymirjar Deathbringer
Core.text: [x]Taunt. Deathrattle: Spend 3 Corpses to summon a 3/3 Risen Ymirjar with Taunt.
Core.flavor: Purple cotton candy is the snack of choice in Ymirheim.

Core.name: Zola the Gorgon
Core.text: Battlecry: Choose a friendly minion. Add a Golden copy of it to your hand.
Core.flavor: Her name seems a bit cheesy.

Core.howToGetDiamond: Obtained by owning 23 Kobolds and Catacombs Legendary cards.

Core.name: Assassinate
Core.text: Destroy an enemy minion.
Core.flavor: If you don't want to be assassinated, move to the Barrens and change your name. Good luck!
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Rogue.

Core.name: Big Game Hunter
Core.text: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with 7 or more Attack.
Core.flavor: Mere devilsaurs no longer excite him.  Soon he'll be trying to catch Onyxia with only a dull Krol Blade.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 2500 total wins.

Core.name: Blessing of Kings
Core.text: Give a minion +4/+4. (+4 Attack/+4 Health)
Core.flavor: Given the number of kings who have been assassinated, are you sure you want their blessing?
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Paladin.

Core.name: Bloodhoof Brave
Core.text: Taunt Has +3 Attack while damaged.
Core.flavor: He thought the set was called "Flippers of the Old Cods" and hungrily volunteered to be in it.  He is definitely going to get his hearing checked.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Warrior.

Core.name: Chillwind Yeti
Core.flavor: He always dreamed of coming down from the mountains and opening a noodle shop, but he never got the nerve.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 500 total wins.

Core.name: Crusader Aura
Core.text: Whenever a friendly minion attacks, give it +2/+1. Lasts 3 turns.
Core.flavor: Also makes your animations 20% faster.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 250 games as Paladin.

Core.name: Death Strike
Core.text: Lifesteal Deal $6 damage to a minion.
Core.flavor: A little embarrassing when used on large minions.
Core.howToGet: Unlocked after completing the Death Knight Prologue.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Death Knight.

Core.name: Defender of Argus
Core.text: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1 and Taunt.
Core.flavor: You wouldn’t think that Argus would need this much defending.  But it does.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 1000 total wins.

Core.name: Drakonid Operative
Core.text: [x]Battlecry: If you're holding a Dragon, Discover a copy of a card in your opponent's deck.
Core.flavor: His job is to spy on the Goons and the Jade Lotus, but he's OBVIOUSLY a dragon so it's pretty hard work.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Priest.

Core.name: Elise Starseeker
Core.text: Battlecry: Shuffle the 'Map to the Golden Monkey' into your deck.
Core.flavor: A large part of her job entails not mixing up the Map to the Golden Monkey with the Map to Monkey Island.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 5000 total wins.

Core.name: Escaped Manasaber
Core.text: [x]Stealth Whenever this attacks, gain 1 Mana Crystal this turn only.
Core.flavor: Captive manasabers don't behave much better--they're always scratching your furniture and coughing up mana balls.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after 2500 total wins.

Core.name: Fandral Staghelm
Core.text: Your Choose One cards and powers have both effects combined.
Core.flavor: Always manages to mention "Back when I was creating the World Tree…" in EVERY conversation. Sheesh! Enough already.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 500 games as Druid.

Core.name: Fireball
Core.text: Deal $6 damage.
Core.flavor: This spell is useful for burning things.  If you're looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you're in the wrong place.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 50 games as Mage.

Core.name: Grave Strength
Core.text: [x]Give your minions +1 Attack. Spend 5 Corpses to give them +3 instead.
Core.flavor: They're just standing there… MENACINGLY!

Core.name: Hench-Clan Burglar

Core.name: High Priestess Jeklik
Core.text: [x]Taunt, Lifesteal When you discard this, add 2 copies of it to your hand.

Core.name: Houndmaster Shaw

Core.name: Lakkari Felhound

Core.name: Lifedrinker

Core.name: Marked Shot
Core.text: Deal $4 damage to_a_minion. Discover_a_spell.

Core.name: Metamorphosis
Core.text: Swap your Hero Power to "Deal 4 damage." After 2 uses, swap it back.
Core.flavor: As the humble caterpillar becomes a beautiful butterfly, so too does a demon hunter become a hideous mass of writhing destruction and unfettered chaos.

Core.name: Siphon Soul

Core.text: [x]Battlecry: Replay every card from another class you've played this game (targets chosen randomly).
Core.flavor: Those who cannot remember their card history are doomed to repeat it.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 500 games as Rogue.

Core.name: Al'Akir the Windlord
Core.text: Charge, Divine Shield, Taunt, Windfury
Core.flavor: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords.  And the other three don't let him forget it.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 500 games as Shaman.

Core.name: Cenarius
Core.text: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.
Core.flavor: Yes, he's a demigod. No, he doesn't need to wear a shirt.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 500 games as Druid.

Core.name: Grommash Hellscream
Core.text: Charge Has +6 Attack while damaged.
Core.flavor: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes!  Maybe not his best decision.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 500 games as Warrior.

Core.name: Illidari Inquisitor
Core.text: Rush. After your hero attacks an enemy, this attacks it too.
Core.flavor: Armed with fear, big eyes, ruthless efficiency, almost fanatical devotion to your hero, and nice brown robes.
Core.howToGetGold: Unlocked after winning 100 games as Demon Hunter.

Core.name: Lord Marrowgar
Core.text: [x]Battlecry: Raise ALL of your Corpses as 1/1 Risen Golems with Rush. For each that can't fit, give one +2/+2.
Core.flavor: And now, Lord Marrowgar with the weather.
Core.howToGet: Unlocked after completing the Death Knight Prologue.

Core.name: Primordial Drake
